entry.tran: （竞争、竞赛等中的）劣势方，弱者
entry.def: The underdog in a competition or situation is the person who seems least likely to succeed or win.

example.ex: Most of the crowd were cheering for the underdog to win just this one time.
example.tran: 人群里的大多数人都在为劣势一方鼓劲，希望他哪怕就赢这一次。
在这次比赛中处于劣势的韦伯
